featuredProjects.title: SanskritGPT
featuredProjects.tagline: Building a Sanskrit Language Model from scratch using Diffusion + Transformers
featuredProjects.description: A masked diffusion-based language model designed specifically for Sanskrit text generation, focusing on semantic denoising rather than next-token prediction.

Token-Level Transformer Denoiser
Sanskrit WordNet–tagged corpus
Iterative Unmasking Generation
featuredProjects.techStack: Python · PyTorch · Transformers · Diffusion Models · NLP

Real-time file sharing and chat

Shared memory–based task queue for inter-process communication
Semaphore-controlled synchronization to prevent race conditions

featuredProjects.title: SlangBot
featuredProjects.tagline: Transformer-based language model trained on Twitter slang, trends, and internet culture
featuredProjects.footer: Personal Research Project · Twitter Slang LLM · 2024
featuredProjects.description: SlangBot is a custom transformer-based language model trained on large-scale Twitter data to understand, generate, and contextualize slang, abbreviations, memes, and evolving internet language in real time.
highlights: Custom transformer architecture trained from scratch
Large-scale Twitter slang and conversational dataset
Context-aware slang understanding and generation
Handles abbreviations, emojis, hashtags, and informal grammar
Temporal awareness of trending slang and phrases
Fine-tuned for conversational and short-text generation
Text normalization and slang-to-formal translation support
Evaluation on social-media-specific NLP benchmarks
featuredProjects.techStack: Python · PyTorch · Transformers · NLP · Tokenization · Twitter Data · CUDA
